title: Bioshock.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Bioshock.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  


Release year : 2007
Genre : Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : 2K Boston and 2K Australia
Publisher : 2K Games
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Rus | Eng
Crack: spider91





System requirements:  


Operating system : Windows XP / Vista
Processor : 2.4 GHz
Memory : 1 GB
Video : with 128 MB RAM
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 5.5 GB



Game information:  


Events awaited innovative "smart shooter" deployed in delight - the underwater
city of the future, where in the late 1940s, supposedly settled people, opened
a miracle substance. Taking it even in small doses, the average person goes
through a series of rapid mutations and before our eyes become faster, stronger,
smarter. One day genetic experiments have led to disaster: intelligent machines
stopped working, the system of artificial climate burned, and the entire
population of the city, the sun suddenly lost his mind. In this crazy world,
players have complete freedom of action. He has the right to decide on the style
passing game, choosing spetsumeniya of a long list and promptly replace them,
as well as one of the hundreds of ways to destroy the enemy. As a weapon you can
use any object as his own body to modify. A fascinating story and innovative
gameplay adds great graphics and clever artificial intelligence.



Game Features:  


Over a dozen fantastic abilities that takes the main character, modifying your
own body with the help of special substances - plasmids: for example, the ability
to shoot lightning from his fingers and releasing a swarm of hornets from the veins.
Submission of the game world's own aims and objectives: the reprogrammed enemy bots
spies are bodyguards, prices in vending machines are changed as if by magic,
and machine-gun towers turn into piles of metal.

Change the arsenal of weapons, as well as their own skills and abilities may be at
special stations located in the city; here you can create plasmid, dispose of trash
found on the road.

As weapons become anything: any object, the body of the hero, fire, water and even
sworn enemies, which you can use the subtle intrigue set on each other.



RePack Features:  

Bioshock
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
An opportunity not to download unneeded voiceovers
(voices_ru.bin - Russian | voices_en.bin - English)
